name: Religious Affiliation SnCT
description: A subset of the Snomed-CT clinical terminology (i.e. coding system) intended for use in the UK, previously named SnomedCTUK, that describes a person's religious affiliation. Any code from the SNOMED CT UK CDA Care Setting Type subset with subset original id 999000531000000100.
